page.title: 12Farming
page.content: The area here is a farming area.We have a man who rears chickens,a horse breeder,a specialist pig farmer,a dairy farmer and the rest are mixed or arable farms. From our survey we have found that 19 people in the area work on farms. Houses called "farms" are sometimes not occupied by farmers as some farmers have taken over smaller farms and the farmhouses have been sold. From our survey we found that all the farmers who live in Walgrave are called Knight and they are all related. SHELDON LODGE Mr.Dillon has a chicken rearing farm.He buys "day old" chickens,rears them and in 18 weeks, when they will be ready to lay eggs, he sells them to other farms.
